alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 12:26AM EDT until April 09 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek At Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding and water begins to flood nearby homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:16 AM EDT Saturday was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 5.1 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Sat 12:15 am: 8.7 Forecast: Sat 2 am 8.4 Sat 8 am 7.2 Sat 2 pm 6.7 Sat 8 pm 6.3 Sun 2 am 6.1 Sun 8 am 5.8 Sun 2 pm 5.6 Sun 8 pm 5.5 Mon 2 am 5.3 Mon 8 am 5.2 Mon 2 pm 5.1 Mon 8 pm 5.1 &&
